name: Am I Only Dreaming? LD48
description:
In this game you wake up in a strange world and you don’t know for sure if it is real or not so you descent depper and deeper to find out more about this strange place you entered through a portal that appeared in yout bedroom in the middle of the night. I can’t tell you more I don’t want to spoil anything.

This is my submission for Ludum Dare 48!
